about_the_game:
Coloring Pixel Fantasy Characters invites you on an enchanting coloring adventure where you can bring your favorite fantasy characters to life with vibrant colors. Immerse yourself in the pixel art world and unleash your creativity to create stunning artwork.

In this captivating game, you'll discover a collection of fantastical characters from the realms of fantasy. From brave warriors to mystical creatures, each character is intricately designed with pixel art, offering a unique and nostalgic aesthetic.

With a wide palette of colors at your disposal, you can explore your artistic side and add your personal touch to each character. Simply select a color and tap or click on the corresponding pixel to fill it with your chosen shade. Watch as the character gradually transforms into a vibrant masterpiece right before your eyes.

Coloring Pixel Fantasy Characters provides a relaxing and immersive coloring experience. Take your time to carefully select colors, zoom in for precision, and bring intricate details to life. With every pixel you color, you'll witness your artwork evolving into a captivating creation.

Express your creativity freely, as the game allows you to experiment with different color combinations and styles. Embrace the unique nature of pixel art and let your imagination guide your brushstrokes. Adjustments and changes can become part of your artistic journey, making each artwork truly unique.

With its intuitive controls and user-friendly interface, Coloring Pixel Fantasy Characters ensures a seamless coloring experience for artists of all ages and skill levels. Let your imagination run wild, explore the magical world of pixel art, and create mesmerizing artworks that transport you to fantastical realms.

So, pick up your virtual brush, select your colors, and dive into the world of Coloring Pixel Fantasy Characters. Unleash your creativity, immerse yourself in the magic of pixel art, and create breathtaking artworks that celebrate the allure of fantasy. Start coloring now and let your imagination soar!

Features:

• Lots of amazing artwork
• Easy coloring: Enjoy the intuitive design and smooth performance of the coloring book
• Long press to color continuously which makes coloring and drawing more easily.
• Easily color any image you want!

Coloring has never been easier! Just relax and color by Coloring Pixel - Fantasy Characters!

Learn how to play:

- Zoom the picture till boxes with numbers appear
- Choose colors in the palette and color boxes with matching numbers
- Use the long tap feature to color neighboring cells faster

name: Coloring Pixel - Fantasy Characters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

short_description: Coloring Pixel - Fantasy Characters is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Coloring Pixel has never been this easy!
